english_example_sentence: If the painter created a beautiful painting, it would receive great interest at the exhibition.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы художник создал красивую картину, она вызвала бы большой интерес на выставке.
turkish_example_sentence: Ressam güzel bir tablo yaratsa, sergide büyük ilgi görür.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ressam güzel bir tablo ______, sergide büyük ilgi görür.
